Package server.universe.item

The server.universe.item package contains Item and all of its subtypes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Armor This class represents some generic armor.
Book Keys are special items that can unlock rooms.
Cannon This is an extension of Weapon that provides properties that a Cannon should have, i.e., it's the best.
CheapTreat Cheap treats increase a player's maximum health by 10 points.
Cloth Extends Armor to provide protection to a wearer.
FancyTreat Fancy treats increase a player's maximum health by 30 points.
Hydes Hydes are a type of armor.
Item Item represents anything in the world that's not a Creature -- anything that has no intelligence or ability to do thing like talking and fighting.
Key Keys are special items that can unlock rooms.
LargePotion Large potion extends Potion, increasing its price and healing power.
SmallPotion Potion class outlines everything a potion does.
Spear This is an extension of Weapon that provides properties that a Spear should have, i.e., cheap and not that good.
SteelMesh Extends Armor to provide protection to a wearer.
Sword This is an extension of Weapon that provides properties that a Sword should have, i.e., more expensive and a better weapon.
Weapon This class represents some generic weapon.
 

Package server.universe.item Description

The server.universe.item package contains Item and all of its subtypes.
